query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Scoping report of previous research on the role of Open Science resources in deliberative policy-making
result.description: D5.1 Scoping report of previous research on the role of Open Science resources in deliberative policy-making (TU GRAZ) <M8> This deliverable will (1) include a literature review focusing on the uptake of Open Science outputs and levels of participation in policy-making and help to identify pertinent research gaps; (2) specify research methodologies for the remaining WP subtasks.

result.title: RRI and Open Science data sets
result.description: D3.1 RRI and Open Science Datasets (OU) <M8> A report documenting background literature research, research methodologies for T3.2 and T3.3, and the processes involved in collecting and refining all three datasets described in Task 3.1, including an initial statistical data analysis. The created datasets will also be made available subject to any licencing restrictions.

result.title: Data management plan
result.description: D1.2: Data management plan (KNOW) <M6> Documents the types of data the project will generate or collect, the standards and platforms that will be used for storage and processing, measures to assure legal compliance (with, e.g., GDPR), and a plan for how these data will be curated and preserved to enable maximal future exploitation, sharing and re-use.
